hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that #a Gold Skulltula Token# can be found at #Hyrule Castle#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that #the Fire Temple# is on the path to #the Key#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that you're wasting time reading this hint, but I disagree. Talk to me again!
